item.title: MySQL Daemon Startup Fix üõ†Ô∏èüïµÔ∏è
item.description: Problem Brief: MySQL daemon fails to start Details: So, I recently installed MariaDB (Community fork of MySQL) on my Manjaro system and when I started the system with: sudo systemctl start mysqld This is the error I get: Job for mariadb.service failed because the control process exited with error code. Let’s look at journalctl -xe: A start job for unit mariadb.service has finished with a failure. Not very helpful, let’s look at mysqld’s status with: systemctl status mysqld
